sense.def:
Stvar, ki je
single
, je edina.

seg.quote: I just couldn't think of a single thing to say.

sense.def:
Besedo
single
uporabimo tudi, ko o neki stvari govorimo ločeno od vseh drugih, ki so ji podobne.

seg.quote: This is the most important single invention since the wheel.
We went to the house every single day for six months.

sense.def:
Oseba, ki je
single
, ni poročena.

Postelja ali soba, ki je
single
, je mišljena samo za eno osebo.

seg.quote: How much is the single fare to London?

sense.def:
A single
je tudi majhna gramofonska plošča; na vsaki strani je posneta samo ena pesem.

Singles
je igra tenisa ali badmintona, v kateri nastopata samo dva igralca.

seg.quote: The high serve is used a lot in singles.

sense.def:
To single someone out
pomeni v skupini izbrati nekoga, ki mu posvetimo posebno pozornost.

seg.quote: Three other people were singled out for special praise.
